track.name: Stop!
comments: Bem vindo.
One of my faves from JB....can't wait to see him next week at the Fox in Detroit!!
Joe Bonamassa...simply always great! (2)
Great version of a great original from Sam Brown. Joe does justice to this powerful song.
Assedor said it well-  not much I can add to that.   :)
First time of hearing JB. I look forward to hearing him again. I like his groove and the vocals.

He is a soulful and energetic performer who brings the best of what people love about music together in one total package: great stage presence and quality sound. His guitar is powerful and inviting in a way that makes you want to hear more. He also has the ability to create an exciting atmosphere anywhere. He can deliver his message on a broadly appealing level with a sincerity that comes through every note and every word.

JB is so cool.
www.jackybullfrog.com
Joe Bonamassa...simply always great!

Again the evening colored with tone of blues notes ... Dipping fearlessly in these rhythms, willingly I play the chords in unison of my mood passing hopeless years into oblivion... Evening smell the rain, hiding twilight town, shrouded in mystery blues burning neon storefronts ...
Joe Bonamassa is Soul and Rhythm of blues!!!!!!!!!! A sad melody is wind's blues ...  The droops of rain drummed on the roof in tact, the rain beating on the tin drainage creating wind's blues
Sweet emotion!
Amo
so jung und so gut !!!
Excellent♥
Really nice!

Blues EXCITEMENT is here! And his name is Joe Bonamassa.
It was a performance without loss of intensity, where the warm vintage sounds of the his instrument was felt projecting from his hearts.
Stop! ... and listen to this beautiful song!!!!
Put your headphones in, close your eyes, lean your head back and enjoy
